heading: HB02312
0: AN ACT PENALIZING THE IMPOSITION OF A 'NO PERMIT, NO EXAM POLICY' OR ANY SUCH POLICY THAT PROHIBITS STUDENTS IN ALL EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS FROM TAKING THEIR PERIODIC, PRELIMS, MIDTERM OR FINAL EXAMINATIONS DUE TO UNPAID TUITION AND OTHER SCHOOL FEES
